name: Florist Shop
description:
teyon.com (from Ad Blurbs)

Match flowers and create fabulous bouquets!

Help Rose to open a small flower business downtown. Run the most successful florist shop in the city by keeping plants always fresh and creating perfect bouquets. Collect flowers by matching 3 or more of them in a row. Prepare stunning compositions and serve them as fast as possible to make your demanding customers happy. Upgrade your business and compete with other shops! There are many add-ons and items to buy and use in your store.

Features:

  • Plenty of add-ons to improve bouquets
  • Special items to buy in a shop
  • Addictive gameplay giving hours of fun
  • Involving storyline in a comic form
  • Various shapes of boards in levels
  • Two game modes: Relaxed and Adventure (with a storyline)
  • The match 3 combined with the time management
